overview.intro: Sɛ́ platform sohwɛfo no, wowɔ kwan kɔ nnwinnade a ɛkɔ akyiri a wode bɛhwɛ na woahwɛ Contentry platform no nyinaa so. Saa akwankyerɛ yi bɛboa wo ma woate wo adwumayɛ tumi ase.
overview.dashboardDesc: Admin Dashboard no ma wotumi hu asɛnka agua so dwumadi ne akwahosan.
overview.feature1: Bere ankasa mu dwumadie a wɔhwɛ so
overview.feature2: Platform-wide nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu nhwehwɛmu
overview.feature3: System akwahosan ne adwumayɛ ho nkyerɛkyerɛmu
overview.feature4: Nneɛma a ɛho hia a wɔde di dwuma wɔ adwumayɛ mu ntɛmntɛm
overview.tip: Kɔ Admin Dashboard daa na woanya nsɛm a ɛfa platform trends ho na woahu nsɛm a ebetumi aba ntɛm.

userManagement.intro: Ɔdefoɔ sohwɛ yɛ adwumayɛ dwumadie titire a ɛma wotumi hwɛ wɔn a wɔde di dwuma ne nnwuma a ɛwɔ platform no so nyinaa so.

userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Kɔ User Management ɔfã no so na hwɛ, hwehwɛ, na hwɛ platform dwumadiefoɔ nyinaa so.

userManagement.feature2: Hwɛ dwumadiefoɔ ho nsɛm ne dwumadie abakɔsɛm a ɛkɔ akyiri
userManagement.feature3: Sesa dwumadie a ɔde di dwuma ne tumi krataa

userManagement.rolesTitle: Dwumadi a Wɔde Di Dwuma Ho Ntease
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry wɔ dwumadie titire mmiɛnsa a ɔde di dwuma:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Full platform access a ɛwɔ system nhyehyeɛ tumi
userManagement.role2: Enterprise Admin: Ɔhwɛ wɔn company no kuw ne nhyehyɛe so
userManagement.role3: Ɔdefoɔ: Standard content creation ne analysis features
userManagement.warning: Bere nyinaa hwɛ nkɛntɛnso no mu hwɛ ansa na woasesa dwumadie a ɔde di dwuma anaa wobɛpopa akontaabuo. Saa nneyɛe yi betumi aka kuw adwumayɛ nhyehyɛe.

gettingStarted.intro: Yɛma wo akwaaba ba Contentry! Sɛ́ Enterprise Administrator no, wowɔ nnwinnade a wode bɛhwɛ wo kuw no so, de nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu akwankyerɛ asi hɔ, na woahwɛ ahu sɛ brand no hyia.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Di anammɔn yi akyi na hyehyɛ wo adwumayɛbea akontaabu:
gettingStarted.step1: Kɔ Settings > Enterprise na kɔ wo company dashboard no so
gettingStarted.step2: Fa wo adwumakuw no brand akwankyerɛ ne nhyehyɛe ahorow gu Nimdeɛ Gyinabea no so
gettingStarted.step3: To nsa frɛ wo kuw no mufo na fa dwumadi ahorow a ɛfata ma
gettingStarted.step4: Hyehyɛ adwumayɛ nhyehyɛe a wɔpene so ma emu nsɛm mu nhwehwɛmu
gettingStarted.tip: Wie wo Nimdeɛ Gyinabea nhyehyɛe no ansa na woato nsa afrɛ kuw no mufo na wɔahwɛ ahu sɛ wobenya kwan anya brand akwankyerɛ fi da a edi kan.

teamManagement.intro: Kuw sohwɛ a etu mpɔn hwɛ hu sɛ wɔbɛyɛ adwuma abom yiye na wɔahwɛ kwan a ɛfata so wɔ w’ahyehyɛde no mu.
teamManagement.inviteTitle: Kuw no mufo a Wɔto nsa frɛ wɔn
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Fa asɔremma foforo ka wo adwumayɛbea kuw no ho:
teamManagement.feature1: Hyehyɛ kuw no muni no email address
teamManagement.feature2: Paw wɔn dwumadie (Ɔbɔadeɛ, Ɔhwɛfoɔ, anaa Ɔhwɛfoɔ) .
teamManagement.feature3: Fa w’ankasa nkrasɛm a wopɛ ka nsato krataa no ho
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Fa dwumadi ahorow a egyina asɛyɛde ahorow so ma:
teamManagement.role1: Ɔbɔadeɛ: Obetumi ayɛ nneɛma na ɔde amena ma wɔapene so
teamManagement.role2: Manager: Obetumi apene/apow nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu na wahwɛ adebɔfo so
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Adwumayɛbea kwan a edi mũ a sikatua ne nhyehyɛe ka ho
teamManagement.tip: Nsato krataa no twam wɔ nnafua 7 akyi. Kae kuw no mufo sɛ wonnye wɔn nsato krataa no ntom ntɛm ara.

knowledgeBase.intro: Nimdeɛ Gyinabea no yɛ wo adwumakuw no adekorabea titiriw a ɛfa brand akwankyerɛ, nhyehyɛe, ne emu nsɛm ho mmara ho. Nwoma a wɔde akɔ ha no bɔ nneɛma a AI ayɛ ma kuw no mufoɔ nyinaa amanneɛ.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Fa nkrataa a ɛbɛkyerɛ nneɛma a ɛwɔ mu no kwan ka ho:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Brand style akwankyerɛ ne nne akwankyerɛ
knowledgeBase.docType2: Mmara ne mmara sodi ho nhyehyɛe ahorow
knowledgeBase.docType3: Akwankyerɛ a ɛfa sɛnea wɔde nneɛma gu sohyial media so
knowledgeBase.docType4: Mmara ahorow a ɛfa nnwuma pɔtee bi ho
knowledgeBase.tip: Fa wo brand akwankyerɛ a ɛho hia sen biara no di kan gu so. AI no de nkrataa a ɛwɔ adwumakuw no Nimdeɛ Gyinabea no di kan sen ankorankoro a wɔde di dwuma no a wɔde gu so.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Adwuma a wɔpene so no hwɛ hu sɛ emu nsɛm nyinaa hyia wo adwumakuw no gyinapɛn ansa na wɔatintim.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu no sen fa saa akwan yi so:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Ɔbɔadeɛ na ɔyɛ anaa ɔhwehwɛ emu nsɛm mu
approvalWorkflow.step2: Wɔde emu nsɛm no kɔma ma wɔpene so (sɛ ɛho hia a) .
approvalWorkflow.step3: Ɔpanyin no hwɛ mu na ɔde nsɛm a wɔka kyerɛ
approvalWorkflow.step4: Wobetumi atintim nsɛm a wɔapene so wɔ sohyial platform ahorow so
approvalWorkflow.warning: Ma ahwehwɛde ahorow a ɛfa pene a wɔpene so wɔ Nsiesiei mu no nyɛ adwuma na ama woahwɛ ahu sɛ wɔahwɛ emu nsɛm nyinaa mu ansa na wɔatintim.

billing.intro: Hwɛ wo adwumayɛbea nkrataahyɛ so na hwɛ sɛnea wɔde bosea di dwuma.
billing.feature1: Mprempren nhyehyɛe no ho nsɛm ne bosea a wɔkyekyɛ
billing.feature2: Abakɔsɛm a wɔde di dwuma ne credits a aka
billing.feature3: Invoice abakɔsɛm ne akwan a wɔfa so tua ho ka

adminUsersPage.title: Ɔdefoɔ a Wɔde Di Dwuma
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Hwɛ wɔn a wɔde di dwuma wɔ platform no nyinaa so
adminUsersPage.searchPlaceholder: Hwehwɛ denam email anaa din so...

actions.impersonate: Yɛ wo ho sɛ wo ho

toasts.loadFailed: Entumi mfa wɔn a wɔde di dwuma no nhyɛ mu
toasts.subscriptionCancelled: Wɔatwa nkrataa a wɔkra no mu
toasts.subscriptionCancelFailed: Mfomso a ɛba bere a wɔretwa nkrataahyɛ mu

adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Wogye di sɛ wopɛ sɛ wopopa saa ɔdefo yi?
adminUsersPage.deleteWarning: Wɔrentumi nsan nyɛ saa adeyɛ yi.

deleteModal.title: Popa Ɔdefo no
deleteModal.description: Eyi bɛpopa nea ɔde di dwuma no ne data a ɛbata ho nyinaa daa:
deleteModal.irreversible: Wɔrentumi nsan nyɛ saa adeyɛ yi.

sections.contentCreation: Nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu a Wɔbɔ
sections.analyzeContent: Hwehwɛ Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu Mu

gettingStarted.intro: Yɛma wo akwaaba ba Contentry! Saa akwankyerɛ yi bɛboa wo ma woayɛ nsɛm a ɛyɛ den, a ɛne mmara hyia denam nnwinnade a AI na ɛyɛ adwuma so.
gettingStarted.step1: Fa nsɛm a ɛyɛ nokware hyehyɛ wo profile
gettingStarted.step2: Fa wo social media akontaabu ahorow no bata ho
gettingStarted.step3: Yɛ Strategic Profile ma wo brand anaa wo ɔsatuo
gettingStarted.step4: Generate wo nsɛm a edi kan no
gettingStarted.tip: Fi ase de Strategic Profile na hwɛ sɛ wo nsɛm nyinaa kura ɛnne ne nkrasɛm a ɛkɔ so daa mu.

contentCreation.intro: Contentry AI-powered content generation boa wo ma wobɔ nsɛm a ɛyɛ anigye wɔ sikɔne kakraa bi mu.
contentCreation.generateDesc: Fa AI yɛ nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu:
contentCreation.feature1: Hyehyɛ asɛmti anaa nsɛm a wɔka kyerɛ a ɛkyerɛkyerɛ nea wopɛ sɛ wode to gua mu
contentCreation.feature2: Paw wo botaeɛ platforms (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, ne nea ɛkeka ho) .
contentCreation.feature3: Paw ɛnne a wopɛ sɛ wokyerɛw
contentCreation.feature4: Sɛ wopɛ a, yɛ mfonini a ɛka ho
contentCreation.schedulingDesc: Yɛ wo content kalenda ho nhyehyɛe:
contentCreation.schedule1: Fa nhyehyɛe ahorow a wɔde yɛ nneɛma a wɔsan yɛ no si hɔ
contentCreation.schedule2: Paw nna ne mmere pɔtee a wode bɛto gua a ɛnyɛ adwuma
contentCreation.schedule3: Ma auto-posting anaa manual review nyɛ adwuma ansa na woatintim
contentCreation.tip: Fa ‘Promotional Content’ checkbox no di dwuma bere a woreyɛ aguadi ho nsɛm na ama woahwɛ ahu sɛ mmara sodi nhwehwɛmu susuw nkɔso akwankyerɛ ho.

analyzeContent.intro: Analyze Content afã no hwɛ wo nsɛm no mu hwɛ sɛnea ɛne mmara hyia, amammerɛ mu nkate, ne brand a ɛne ne ho hyia.
analyzeContent.howToTitle: Sɛnea Wɔbɛhwehwɛ Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu
analyzeContent.howToDesc: Fa emu nsɛm mena ma wɔnhwehwɛ mu:
analyzeContent.step1: Kɔ Content Moderation > Hwehwɛ Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu
analyzeContent.step2: Fa wo nsɛm no hyɛ baabi a wobɛkyerɛw no
analyzeContent.step3: Paw Strategic Profile ma nsɛm a ɛfa ho
analyzeContent.step4: Klik Analyze na woanya nsɛm a ɛkɔ akyiri
analyzeContent.type1: Adwumakuw no nhyehyɛe ne akwankyerɛ ahorow a wodi so
analyzeContent.type2: Amammerɛ mu nkate a ɛwɔ mmeae ahorow
analyzeContent.type3: Brand nne ne ɛnne a ɛkɔ so pɛpɛɛpɛ
analyzeContent.type4: Asiane ahorow a ebetumi aba ne nyansahyɛ ahorow
analyzeContent.tip: Bere nyinaa hwehwɛ emu nsɛm mu ansa na woatintim akɔ abɔnten so, titiriw wɔ ɔsatu ahorow a wɔde wɔn ani asi mpɔtam pii so no ho.

strategicProfiles.intro: Strategic Profiles kyerɛkyerɛ nsɛm a ɛfa ho, ɛnne, ne akwankyerɛ a wɔde bɛyɛ nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu ne nhwehwɛmu.
strategicProfiles.createDesc: Fa Strategic Profile (Akwankyerɛ Ho Nsɛm) Si hɔ:
strategicProfiles.feature1: Kyerɛkyerɛ nnipa a wɔde wɔn ani asi wɔn so ne atirimpɔw a ɛwɔ profile no mu
strategicProfiles.feature2: Fa amammerɛ ne ɔmantam mu nsusuwii ahorow sisi hɔ
strategicProfiles.feature3: Fa nkrataa ne akwankyerɛ ahorow a ɛfa profile pɔtee bi ho to so
strategicProfiles.feature4: Hyehyɛ default tone ne style a wopɛ
strategicProfiles.tip: Yɛ Strategic Profiles a ɛsono emu biara ma ɔsatu ahodoɔ, brands, anaa ɔmantam gua ahodoɔ.

socialAccounts.intro: Fa wo social media accounts no bata ho na tintim nsɛm a efi Contentry hɔ tẽẽ.
socialAccounts.connectDesc: Platform ahorow a wɔboa no bi ne:
socialAccounts.warning: Ma wo social account nkitahodi ahorow no nyɛ nea ɛyɛ foforo. Token ahorow a ne bere atwam betumi asiw nsɛm a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ no kwan sɛ wɔbɛtintim.

approvalProcess.intro: Sɛ w’adwumakuw no wɔ approval workflows a wɔahyɛ no den a, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhwɛ emu nsɛm no mu ansa na wɔatintim.
approvalProcess.step1: Yɛ wo nsɛm no anaa hwehwɛ mu
approvalProcess.step2: Klik ‘Submit for Approval’ na fa kɔma wo manager
approvalProcess.step3: Track pene tebea wɔ Pending Approval ntonto mu
approvalProcess.tip: Fa nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw ka ho bere a wode nsɛm remena no na ama nhwehwɛmufo anya nsɛm a ɛfa w’adebɔ ho gyinaesi ahorow ho.

aboutGuide.title: About & Nneyɛe a Ɛyɛ Paara
aboutGuide.description: Sua deɛ Contentry yɛ ma na hunu nneyɛeɛ pa a ɛbɛma wo nsɛm a wobɛbɔ, brand deals, ne influencer profiles ayɛ yie.
aboutGuide.feature2: Afotu a Ɛfa Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu no Ho
aboutGuide.feature3: Brand Deal Akwan a Wɔfa so Yɛ

sections.optimizeContent: Ma Wo Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu no Yɛ Nea Ɛyɛ Paara
sections.brandDeals: Brand Deals & Nkitahodi a Wɔde Di Dwuma

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry yɛ AI-powered content intelligence platform a wɔayɛ sɛ ɛbɛboa content creators, marketers, ne nnwumayɛfoɔ ma wɔayɛ, ahwehwɛ mu, na wɔatintim content a ɛne mmara hyia wɔ scale mu. Sɛ́ ebia woyɛ ankorankoro nkɛntɛnsofo anaasɛ woyɛ aguadi kuw kɛse bi fã no, Contentry ma wo nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu adwumayɛ no yɛ mmerɛw.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Yɛgye di sɛ yɛbɛma adebɔfoɔ tumi denam nnwinnadeɛ a nyansa wom a ɛhwɛ sɛ nsɛm biara a ɛwɔ mu no yɛ nea ɛwɔ ahyɛnsodeɛ so, ɛfa amammerɛ ho, na ɛne platform akwankyerɛ hyia.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: AI-powered content generation a ɛne wo brand nne hyia
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Bere ankasa mu nhwehwɛmu a wɔyɛ de hwɛ sɛnea wodi mmara so wɔ mmara mu ahwehwɛde ahorow ho
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Amammerɛ mu nkate mu nhwehwɛmu ma wiase nyinaa atiefo
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Adwumayɛ nhyehyɛe a wɔapene so a wɔayɛ no yiye ama nnwumakuw akuw
whatIsContentry.tip: Akasakasa de tumi a AI wɔ ne nnipa hwɛ bom de nsɛm a ɛka w’atiefo no ma bere a wokɔ so di mmara so no ma.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry de nnwinnadeɛ a ɛkɔ akyiri a wode bɛhwɛ wo nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu nkwa nna nyinaa so ma:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Yɛ nneɛma a ɛkorɔn a wɔayɛ ama wo brand ne atiefo:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Nsɛm a ɛwɔ platform ahorow pii so awo ntoatoaso (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram) .
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Nnyigyei a wɔde kyerɛw a wotumi sesa (Adwumayɛfo, Akɔmfo, Nkannyan) .
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: AI mfonini awo ntoatoaso a ɛbɛka wo nsɛm ho
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Hwɛ sɛ wo nsɛm no di ahwehwɛde nyinaa ho dwuma ansa na woatintim:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Automated compliance checking a ɛne adwumakuw no nhyehyɛe hyia
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Amammerɛ mu nkate mu nkontabuo a wɔde ma amanaman ntam atiefoɔ
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Asiane ho nhwehwɛmu a wɔde nyansahyɛ ahorow a wobetumi de adi dwuma wom
keyFeatures.tip: Fa Strategic Profiles di dwuma de hwɛ hu sɛ brand nne a ɛkɔ so daa wɔ nneɛma a wɔayɛ nyinaa mu.

bestPractices.intro: Saa nneyɛe pa yi a wubedi akyi no bɛboa wo ma woanya mfaso kɛse afi Contentry mu na woayɛ nneɛma a ɛyɛ adwuma yiye:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Fa Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu Adwumayɛ Nhyehyɛe Si hɔ
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Adwumayɛ nhyehyɛe a ɛkɔ so daa hwɛ hu sɛ ɛyɛ papa na ɛyɛ adwuma yiye:
bestPractices.workflow1: Fi ase denam wo Strategic Profile a wode brand akwankyerɛ bɛhyehyɛ so
bestPractices.workflow2: Yɛ nneɛma a asɛnka agua pɔtee ne atiefo wɔ w’adwenem
bestPractices.workflow3: Bere nyinaa hwehwɛ emu nsɛm mu ansa na woatintim wɔ abɔnten nhyiam ase
bestPractices.workflow4: Fa nhyehyɛe mu nneɛma di dwuma na ama woakura posting cadence a ɛkɔ so daa
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Ahyɛnsode a wɔde hyɛ nneɛma mu bere nyinaa ma wonya ahotoso ne gye a wogye tom:
bestPractices.consistency1: Fa wo brand style guide no kɔ Nimdeɛ Base no so
bestPractices.consistency2: Fa Strategic Profile koro no ara di dwuma ma ɔsatu ahorow a ɛfa ho
bestPractices.consistency3: Hwɛ nneɛma a AI ayɛ mu hwɛ sɛ ɛne wo nne hyia
bestPractices.warning: Hwɛ nsɛm a AI ayɛ mu bere nyinaa ansa na woatintim. Bere a yɛn AI no wɔ tumi no, nnipa hwɛ ma yenya nea eye sen biara.

optimizeContent.intro: Nsɛm akɛse a wɔbɛbɔ no yɛ mfiase ara kwa. Sɛnea wobɛyɛ optimize ama maximum engagement ni:
optimizeContent.platformTitle: Platform-Specific Nneɛma a Wɔde Yɛ Adwuma
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Asɛnka agua biara wɔ ahwehwɛde soronko ne nea atiefo hwɛ kwan:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Fa w’adwene si adwumayɛfo nhumu so, fa nnwuma mu nsɛmfua atitiriw di dwuma, ɔkwan tenten a wogye tom
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Nkrasɛm a ɛyɛ tiawa, fa hashtags di dwuma wɔ ɔkwan a ɛfata so, fa wo ho hyɛ nsɛmti a ɛrekɔ so no mu
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Nneɛma a wɔde aniwa hu yɛ adwuma yiye, ɛhyɛ mpɔtam hɔfo a wɔde wɔn ho bɛhyɛ mu ho nkuran
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Mfonini ahorow a ɛkorɔn ho hia, fa hashtags a ɛfata di dwuma, Nsɛm ma aware nhyehyɛe
optimizeContent.engagement1: Fa nsɛm to gua bere nyinaa wɔ mmere a eye ma w’atiefo no mu
optimizeContent.engagement2: Fa ɔfrɛ a ɛhyɛ nkuran a wɔde frɛ obi ma woyɛ ade di dwuma wɔ wo nsɛm no mu
optimizeContent.engagement3: Bua nsɛm a wɔka na wo ne wo mpɔtam hɔfo nni nkitaho
optimizeContent.engagement4: Track analytics na te nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu a ɛyɛ adwuma yiye no ase
optimizeContent.tip: Fa Contentry nhyehyɛe afã no di dwuma de mena wɔ mmere a eye sen biara mu a wommɔ mmɔden biara.

brandDeals.intro: Brand fekubɔ betumi ayɛ sika kɛse a wonya. Sɛnea wobɛma wo kwan no ayɛ papa ni:
brandDeals.preparationTitle: Ahosiesie a Wɔreyɛ ama Brand Partnerships
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Siesie wo ho bere a hokwan ahorow sɔre no:
brandDeals.prep1: Kura adwumayɛfo a wɔyɛ adwumaden, a ɛkɔ so daa nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu no mu
brandDeals.prep2: Track na kyerɛ wo engagement metrics
brandDeals.prep3: Yɛ media kit a wo demographics ne reach ka ho
brandDeals.prep4: Fa Contentry di dwuma de yɛ nhwɛsode branded content concepts
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: Ma wo nnyigyei ahorow no da nsow:
brandDeals.pitch1: Fa wo kasa no ne brand no gyinapɛn ahorow ne atiefo a wɔde w’ani asi wɔn so no hyia
brandDeals.pitch2: Fa emu nsɛm pɔtee ho adwene ma sen sɛ wode nsusuwii ahorow a ɛfa nneɛma nyinaa ho bɛma
brandDeals.pitch3: Fa nhwehwɛmu a ɛfa mmara sodi ho ka ho na ama woakyerɛ sɛ wo nsɛm no hyia akwankyerɛ ahorow
brandDeals.tip: Fa Contentry’s compliance checking di dwuma bere a woreyɛ sponsored content de ahwɛ ahu sɛ wɔadi FTC ne platform a wɔda no adi ahwehwɛde ahorow so.

influencerProfiles.intro: Wo Strategic Profile no ne wo content strategy no fapem. Sɛnea wobɛma ayɛ yiye ni:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Profile a wɔahyehyɛ no yiye hwɛ hu sɛ nsɛm a ɛkɔ so daa, a ɛwɔ brand so:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Kyerɛkyerɛ wo niche ne target audience mu pefee
influencerProfiles.setup2: Fa nne a wopɛ sɛ wokyerɛw ne ɔkwan a wobɛfa so akyerɛw no si hɔ
influencerProfiles.setup3: Fa amammerɛ ne ɔmantam mu nsusuwii ahorow ka ho ma w’atiefo
influencerProfiles.setup4: Fa reference documents a ɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo brand nne mu gu so
influencerProfiles.optimizeTitle: Profile Adwumayɛ a Wɔbɛyɛ no Yiye
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Kɔ so tu mpɔn wɔ wo profile mu na ama woanya nea eye:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Hwɛ nneɛma a wɔayɛ no mu na yɛ nsakrae wɔ profile nhyehyɛe mu sɛnea ɛho hia
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Yɛ profile ahorow pii ma ɔsatu ahorow anaa atiefo ahorow
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Ma wo Nimdeɛ Gyinabea no nyɛ foforo denam akwankyerɛ a aba so foforo a ɛfa brand ho
influencerProfiles.tip: Hwɛ wo Strategic Profile no mu bosome mmiɛnsa biara na hwɛ sɛ ɛda wo brand ne atiefoɔ a ɛrenya nkɔsoɔ adi.

workflowsGuide.title: Adwumayɛ Nhyehyɛe & Nkonimdi Akwankyerɛ
workflowsGuide.description: Sua sɛnea nkontabuo nhyehyɛe no yɛ adwuma na te adwumayɛ anammɔn biara ase fi nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu nhwehwɛmu so kosi pene a wɔpene so.
workflowsGuide.feature2: Hwehwɛ Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu Adwuma mu

sections.analyzeContent: Hwehwɛ Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu Mu

scoring.intro: Nkonimdie nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛwɔ Contentry mu no ma nkontabuo a ɛda adi pefee, a egyina asotweɛ so de boa wo ma wote sɛdeɛ wo nsɛm no yɛ adwuma ase. Nkonimdi nyinaa fi ase fi 100 na wɔtew nkontaahyɛde mu wɔ mmara so bu pɔtee anaa nsɛm a wɔahu ho.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Nkonimdie no nyinaa yɛ nhwehwɛmu mu nneɛma nyinaa a wɔaka abom, ɛfiri 0 kɔsi 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Ɛyɛ papa - Ɛyɛ krado sɛ wobɛtintim, emu nsɛm no yɛ nea wɔayɛ no yiye kɛse
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Eye - Nkɔsoɔ nketenkete a wɔkamfo kyerɛ ansa na wɔatintim
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Hia Adwene - Nhwehwɛmu ne nsakraeɛ a ɛhia
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Flagged - Nsɛm a ɛho hia, ntintim kosi sɛ wobesiesie
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Nkonimdie no nyinaa de adaptive weighting a egyina asiane dodoɔ so di dwuma:
scoring.overallCalc3: Asiane a Ɛwɔ Din Ho (Amammerɛ mu ≤50): (Wɔadi Mmara so × 40%) + (Amammerɛ × 40%) + (Pɛpɛɛpɛ × 20%) .
scoring.overallCalc4: Asiane a Ɛho Hia (Compliance ≤40): Ne nyinaa mu nkontabuo hard-capped wɔ 40 maximum
scoring.componentsDesc: Wɔde nhyehyɛe a egyina asotwe so na ebu wo nkontaahyɛde nyinaa fi nneɛma atitiriw abiɛsa mu:
scoring.component1: Compliance Score: Efi ase fi 100, wɔtew nsɛntitiriw wɔ mmara so bu biara a wohu no mu
scoring.component2: Amammerɛ mu Nkateɛ Nkonimdie: Sɛ wɔkyekyɛ mu a, Hofstede amammerɛ mu nsusuiɛ 6 no mu
scoring.component3: Pɛpɛɛpɛ Nkonimdi: Efi ase fi 100, ɛtwe nsɛntitiriw wɔ pɛpɛɛpɛyɛ anaa asɛm biara a wɔahu no mu
scoring.complianceDetailTitle: Nkonimdi a Wɔde Di Dwuma (Egyina Asotwe So) .
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Post biara fi ase de Compliance Score a ɛyɛ 100. Wɔtwe nkontabuo wɔ mmara sobu biara ho:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Critical Violation (-60 pts): NDA a wɔabu so, kokoam nsɛm a wɔda no adi → Asiane a ɛwɔ hɔ sɛ wobegyae adwuma no ntɛm ara
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Mmara so bu a emu yɛ den (-40 pts): Ɔhaw, nyiyim, ɔtan kasa → Mmara kwan so adeyɛ ho asiane
scoring.complianceSeverity3: High Violation (-25 pts): Dawurubɔ a wɔda no adi a ɛyera, nhyehyɛe a wobu so → Asotwe/asiane a wɔde begyae adwuma
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Mmara so bu a ɛkɔ fam (-10 pts): Ɛnne a ɛmfata, akwankyerɛ ketewaa bi a ɛtwetwe → Ntetee/kɔkɔbɔ
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Nhwɛsoɔ: #ad (-25) a ɛyera + Tone issue (-10) = Nkonimdie a ɛtwa toɔ a ɛyɛ 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Multiple violations stack - wɔde asotwe biara di dwuma cumulatively
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Mmara so bu a wɔahwɛ mu: Ahintasɛm ho nsɛm, Ɔhaw, NDA a wɔabu so, Nsɛm a wɔda no adi a ɛyera, Nhyehyɛe a wɔabu so, Ɛnne a ɛmfata
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Amammerɛ mu nkontabuo yɛ Hofstede amammerɛ mu nsusuiɛ asia a ɛyɛ aban dea (0-100 biara):
scoring.culturalDim1: Tumi Akwansin: Formality, obu a wɔde ma tumidi vs. egalitarian, casual tone
scoring.culturalDim2: Ankorankoro vs. Collectivism: ‘Me/Me’ adwene vs. ‘Yɛn/Yɛn’ mpɔtam hɔ adwene
scoring.culturalDim3: Mmarima ne Ɔbea: Akansi/asɛm a wɔka de kyerɛ ne biakoyɛ/adwene a wɔpene so kasa
scoring.culturalDim4: Kwati a wontumi nsi pi: Mmara, ahobammɔ, pefeeyɛ a wosi so dua vs. abue a wobue ma nsɛm a emu nna hɔ
scoring.culturalDim5: Bere Tenten Nkyerɛkyerɛmu: Daakye akatua a wɔde wɔn adwene si so vs. bere tiaa mu mfaso
scoring.culturalDim6: Indulgence vs. Restraint: Anidaso/anigye vs. kasa a wɔde asie/a wɔahyɛ so
scoring.culturalRisk: Sɛ Cultural Score kɔ fam sen 50 a, wɔde ‘Reputation Risk’ weighting di dwuma de bɔ wo brand ho ban wɔ wiase nyinaa atiefo nyinaa mu
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Post biara fi ase de Accuracy Score a ɛyɛ 100. Wɔtwe nkontabuo fi nsɛm a wɔahu no mu:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Major Inccuracy/Misinformation (-40 pts): Atoro nsɛm, nsɛm a wɔayɛ
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Non-Credible Source (-20 pts): Nsɛm a wɔka fi mmeae a wontumi mfa ho nto so
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Unverifiable Claim (-10 pts): Nsɛm a wontumi nhwɛ mu nokwasɛm
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Nhwɛsoɔ: Atoro asɛm (-40) + Fibea a wɔannye antom (-20) = Nkonimdie a ɛtwa toɔ a ɛyɛ 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Multiple issues stack - wɔde asotwe biara di dwuma cumulatively
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Wɔgyina nhwehwɛmu aba so na wɔde frankaa na ɛkyerɛ emu nsɛm no ara kwa:
scoring.flag1: Good Coverage (Green): Nkonimdie a ɛboro 80 - ayɛ krado sɛ wɔbɛtintim
scoring.flag2: Hia Adwene (Kɔkɔbɔ): Nkonimdi 60-79 - nkɔso nketenkete a wɔkamfo kyerɛ
scoring.flag3: Flagged for Review (Orange): Nkonimdi 40-59 - nhwehwɛmu a wɔhwehwɛ ansa na wɔatintim
scoring.flag4: Nsɛm a Ɛho Hia (Kɔkɔbɔ): Nkonimdi a ɛba fam sen 40 - ntintim kosi sɛ wobesiesie
scoring.disclosureTitle: Dawurubɔ Ho Nsɛm a Wɔda no Adi Nhwehwɛmu
scoring.disclosureDesc: Sɛ wopɛ nsɛm a wɔde hyɛ nkurɔfo nkuran a, nhyehyɛe no nso hwɛ:
scoring.disclosure1: Is Promotional: Ɛhu sɛ emu nsɛm no yɛ dawurubɔ anaasɛ wɔboa
scoring.disclosure2: Has Disclosure: Hwɛ sɛ #ad, #sponsored, anaa partnership a wɔada no adi yie anaa
scoring.disclosure3: Ɔmantam Mmara so: Ɛhwɛ FTC (US), EU, ne Norway ahwehwɛde ahorow a ɛfa nsɛm a wɔda no adi ho
scoring.disclosure4: Nsɛm a wɔda no adi a ɛyera no kanyan Mmara sobu a Ɛkorɔn (-25 points) wɔ Compliance Score so
scoring.tip: Wɔsan bu nkontabuo bere biara a wɔbɛhwehwɛ emu nsɛm mu no. Fa Rewrite feature no di dwuma na ama nneɛma a ɛwɔ nkontabuo a ɛba fam no atu mpɔn ankasa bere a wokura wo nkrasɛm no mu no.

analyze.intro: Analyze Content adwumayɛ nhyehyɛe no boa wo ma wohwehwɛ nsɛm a ɛwɔ hɔ dedaw no mu hwɛ sɛ ɛyɛ nea ɛne mmara hyia, amammerɛ mu nkate, ne nea ɛyɛ papa ansa na woatintim.
analyze.stepsTitle: Sɛnea Wɔbɛhwehwɛ Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu
analyze.stepsDesc: Di anammɔn yi akyi na hwehwɛ wo nsɛm mu:
analyze.step1: Kɔ Content Intelligence > Analyze Nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu tab no so
analyze.step2: Fa wo nsɛm no hyɛ baabi a wobɛkyerɛw no anaa kyerɛw
analyze.step3: Paw Strategic Profile na fa wo brand akwankyerɛ di dwuma
analyze.step4: Sɛ wopɛ a, hwɛ ‘Generate accompanying image’ sɛ wopɛ sɛ AI yɛ mfonini a wɔde hwɛ ade a
analyze.step5: Klik 'Analyze' na fa nhwehwɛmu no nyinaa di dwuma
analyze.type1: Compliance Check: Ɛhwɛ sɛ nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu no hyia platform nhyehyɛe ne nhyehyɛe ahorow (FTC, GDPR) .
analyze.type2: Amammerɛ mu Nkate: Ɛhwehwɛ nneɛma a ebetumi ayɛ abufuw anaasɛ ɛnyɛ amammerɛ mu nkate
analyze.type3: Pɛpɛɛpɛ a Wɔde Di Dwuma: Ɛhwehwɛ nsɛm a wɔka ne nokwasɛm ahorow mu hwɛ sɛ ɛyɛ nokware anaa
analyze.type4: Brand Alignment: Ɛde nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu toto wo Strategic Profile akwankyerɛ ho
analyze.tip: Fa ‘Rewrite’ button no di dwuma na ama nsɛm a ɛwɔ nkontabuo a ɛba fam sen 70 no atu mpɔn.AI no bedi nsɛm a wɔahyɛ no agyirae ho dwuma bere a ɛrekura wo nkrasɛm no mu.

generate.intro: Generate Content adwumayɛ nhyehyɛe no de AI di dwuma de yɛ nsɛm foforo a egyina w’asɛmti, platform ahwehwɛde, ne brand akwankyerɛ so.
generate.stepsTitle: Sɛnea Wɔbɛyɛ Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu
generate.step1: Kɔ Content Intelligence > Nsɛm a Wɔde Yɛ Adwuma tab
generate.step2: Hyehyɛ w’asɛmti anaa kyerɛkyerɛ nea wopɛ sɛ wobɔ mu
generate.step3: Paw wo botae platform (s) ne akyerɛw nne
generate.step4: Paw Strategic Profile na ama brand no ayɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ
generate.step5: Klik 'Generate' na yɛ nneɛma a AI na ɛyɛ adwuma
generate.optionsDesc: Fa saa akwan yi yɛ wo nneɛma a woayɛ no sɛnea wopɛ:
generate.option1: Platform Paw: Paw platform biako anaa pii (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram) .
generate.option2: Nkyerɛwee Nne: Paw fi Adwumayɛfo, Casual, Nkannyan, anaa Nsɛm a Wɔde Ma
generate.option3: Nsɛm a Ɛwɔ Mu Tenten: Yɛ nsakrae wɔ tenten a wode asi w’ani so ma wo nsɛm no
generate.option4: Mfonini a Wɔyɛ: Toggle on na yɛ mfonini a AI ayɛ a ɛka ho
generate.tip: Wɔyɛ nneɛma a wɔayɛ no mu nhwehwɛmu ankasa bere a wɔabɔ no awie no. Hwɛ nkontabuo no mu na fa feedback buttons no di dwuma de san yɛ foforo sɛ ɛho hia a.

schedulePrompt.intro: Schedule Prompt ma wo kwan ma wo hyehyɛ automated content generation a ɛkɔ so wɔ mmere pɔtee bi mu, na ɛma wo content calendar no yɛ ma a nsa mfa wo ho nhyɛ mu.
schedulePrompt.howToTitle: Nsɛm a Wɔahyɛ Da Ayɛ a Wobɛhyehyɛ
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Yɛ nsɛm a wɔka kyerɛ a ɛma nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu no ankasa:
schedulePrompt.step1: Yɛ wo content generation prompt a asɛmti ne nea wopɛ
schedulePrompt.step2: Fa nhyehyɛe no si hɔ mpɛn dodow (da biara, dapɛn biara, anaa nna pɔtee bi) .
schedulePrompt.step3: Paw bere a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ emu nsɛm
schedulePrompt.step4: Ma 'Auto-analyze' nyɛ adwuma ma ɛnyɛ nhwehwɛmu wɔ nneɛma a wɔayɛ so ankasa
schedulePrompt.benefitsTitle: Mfaso a Ɛwɔ Nsɛm a Wɔahyehyɛ a Wɔahyehyɛ So
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Kura posting a ɛkɔ so daa a wonyɛ da biara da nsaanodwuma
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Yɛ nneɛma a ɛwɔ mu wɔ adebɔ nnɔnhwerew a eye sen biara mu
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Yɛ content backlog ma nhwehwɛmu na wɔpene so
schedulePrompt.tip: Scheduled prompts ma wonya nsɛm a ɛwɔ wo drafts no mu. Hwɛ na pene so ansa na woatintim na ama woahwɛ ahu sɛ ɛyɛ papa.

schedulePost.intro: Schedule Post ma wo kwan ma wode nneɛma a wɔapene so no to ntonto mu ma wotintim no ɔtopae wɔ mmere a eye sen biara mu wɔ wo social media platform ahorow a ɛka ho no so.
schedulePost.step1: Sɛ wofi nsɛm biara a wobɛhwɛ mu a, klik ‘Schedule’ so sen sɛ wobɛbɔ ‘Publish Now’.
schedulePost.step2: Paw da ne bere a wode w’ani asi so sɛ wubetintim
schedulePost.step3: Paw social platform ahorow a ɛka bom a wobɛtintim wɔ so
schedulePost.step4: Si so dua na fa ka wo ntonto a woahyɛ da ayɛ ho nhyehyɛe no ho
schedulePost.optionsDesc: Hyehyɛ wo nsɛm a woahyɛ da ayɛ ho nhyehyɛe:
schedulePost.option1: Bere Pɔtee: Paw da ne bere pɔtee a wode betintim
schedulePost.option2: Bere a Ɛyɛ Paara: Ma AI nkyerɛ bere a eye sen biara a wɔde bɛto gua a egyina engagement data so
schedulePost.option3: Multi-Platform: Yɛ nhyehyɛe ma nsɛm koro no ara wɔ platform ahorow pii so prɛko pɛ
schedulePost.warning: Anyɛ yiye koraa no, nsɛm a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ ho nhyehyɛe hwehwɛ sɛ wɔde sohyial media akontaabu biako abɔ mu. Fa akontaabu ahorow a ɛwɔ Settings > Social Profiles no bata ho.

approval.intro: Approval Workflow no hwɛ hu sɛ emu nsɛm no yɛ papa denam hwehwɛ a ɛhwehwɛ sɛ ɔpanyin no hwɛ mu ansa na wɔatintim no so. Eyi ho hia titiriw ma nnwumakuw akuw ne nnwuma a wɔahyɛ ho mmara.
approval.processDesc: Sɛnea emu nsɛm no fa adwuma a wɔpene so no mu:
approval.step1: Ɔbɔadeɛ de nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu no mena denam ‘Submit for Approval’ a ɔbɔ so.
approval.step2: Nsɛm a ɛwɔ mu no bɛpue wɔ manager no Approval Queue no mu
approval.step3: Ɔpanyin no hwɛ emu nsɛm, nkontabuo, ne nhwehwɛmu mu aba
approval.step4: Manager pene so, srɛ sɛ wɔnyɛ nsakrae, anaasɛ ɔpow emu nsɛm no
approval.status1: Draft: Wɔreyɛ emu nsɛm ho adwuma, wonnya mfaa nkɔmaa
approval.status2: Pending Approval: Wɔde akɔma na wɔretwɛn sɛ ɔpanyin no bɛhwɛ mu
approval.status3: Wɔapene so: Wɔasiesie ne ho sɛ wobetintim anaa wɔbɛyɛ nhyehyɛe
approval.status4: Needs Revision: Manager bisaa nsakrae - hwɛ nsɛm a wɔka na san fa kɔ
approval.tip: Fa nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw ka ho bere a wode nsɛm remena no na ama nhwehwɛmufo anya nsɛm a ɛfa w’adebɔ ho gyinaesi ahorow ho. Eyi ma pene a wɔpene so no yɛ ntɛmntɛm.

gdpr.weValuePrivacy: Yɛbu Wo Kokoam Nsɛm a Ɛsom Bo
gdpr.cookieDescription: Yɛde cookies di dwuma de ma wo browsing osuahu tu mpɔn, de nneɛma a wopɛ ma, na yɛhwehwɛ yɛn akwantu mu. Sɛ wobɔ "Gye Ne Nyinaa tom" a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ woapene so sɛ yɛde cookies bedi dwuma. Wubetumi ayɛ nea wopɛ anaasɛ wobɛpow cookies a ɛho nhia.
gdpr.readPrivacyPolicy: Kenkan yɛn Nsɛm a Wɔde Sie
gdpr.customizePreferences: Yɛ Nneɛma a Wopɛ sɛ Wopɛ
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Ɛho hia ma nokwaredi, ahobammɔ, ne mfitiase dwumadi. Wontumi nsiw no dɛm.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Boa yɛn ma yɛnte sɛnea nsrahwɛfo ne yɛn platform no di nkitaho na ama yɛn nnwuma atu mpɔn no ase.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Wɔde di dwuma de dawurubɔ ahorow a wɔayɛ ama obiara ma na wɔsusuw sɛnea ɔsatu no tu mpɔn.
